titleStmt.title: Englands vvarning-peece gone forth. Written upon an occasion of the coming forth of a book of one Thomas Robbins B. of D. And as he calls himself England's watchman, but is discovered to be England's blind guide. By one Richard Farneworth a servant of the Lord. York-shire. June 1653.
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Wayte, and are to be sold at the Pavement in York.,

notesStmt.note: According to Fortesque this is a reply to: Englands gentle admonition. According to Wing, apparently not published until the 1670's.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
